collection_metadata.name: FeatBit featbit-deployment-kubernetes Evaluation Tests
collection_metadata.description: Evaluation test collection for featbit-deployment-kubernetes skill

test_items.name: k8s-helm-basic-installation
test_items.description: Validates basic Kubernetes deployment using Helm charts with default configuration
test_items.input_task_prompt: How do I deploy FeatBit to my Kubernetes cluster? I want to use Helm and start with a basic setup.
test_items.evaluation_prompt:
Expected Result:
- helm repo add command
- helm repo update
- kubectl create namespace
- helm install command
- Verification steps: kubectl get pods, kubectl get svc
- How to access UI (port-forward or LoadBalancer)
- Mentions default Standalone architecture

Evaluation Method:
1. Verify all Helm commands correct
2. Check namespace creation shown
3. Confirm installation command proper
4. Check verification steps included
5. Verify access method explained

Pass Criteria:
- Complete Helm workflow
- All commands syntactically correct
- Verification steps included
- Access method shown
- Beginner-friendly explanation

Fail Criteria:
- Missing Helm repo setup
- Incorrect install command
- No verification steps
- No access guidance

test_items.name: k8s-ingress-configuration
test_items.description: Validates Ingress configuration for exposing FeatBit services with TLS in production
test_items.input_task_prompt: I need to expose FeatBit services (UI, API, Evaluation Server) through Ingress with HTTPS. How do I configure this in Helm values?
test_items.evaluation_prompt:
Expected Result:
- values.yaml with ingress configuration
- ingressClassName specified
- All three services configured (ui, api, evaluation)
- TLS configuration
- Host/domain configuration
- annotations for cert-manager or SSL
- WebSocket support for evaluation server

Evaluation Method:
1. Check values.yaml structure
2. Verify all 3 services have ingress
3. Confirm TLS configured
4. Check WebSocket annotations for eval server
5. Verify cert-manager integration if used

Pass Criteria:
- Complete ingress configuration
- All services properly exposed
- TLS/HTTPS configured
- WebSocket support noted
- Production-ready setup

Fail Criteria:
- Incomplete ingress config
- Missing TLS
- No WebSocket support
- Only HTTP shown

test_items.name: k8s-scaling-configuration
test_items.description: Validates horizontal scaling configuration for FeatBit services in Kubernetes
test_items.input_task_prompt: Our FeatBit deployment needs to handle more traffic. How do I scale the API and Evaluation Server horizontally? What about autoscaling?
test_items.evaluation_prompt:
Expected Result:
- replicaCount configuration in values.yaml
- Which services can scale (api, evaluation)
- Which cannot (database)
- HPA (HorizontalPodAutoscaler) configuration
- Resource requests/limits
- Session affinity considerations
- Database connection pooling

Evaluation Method:
1. Verify replica configuration shown
2. Check HPA example provided
3. Confirm resource limits explained
4. Check stateful vs stateless discussed
5. Verify database scaling separately

Pass Criteria:
- Horizontal scaling properly explained
- HPA configuration provided
- Resource management addressed
- Scaling limitations noted
- Best practices included

Fail Criteria:
- Suggests scaling database same way
- No resource configuration
- Missing HPA
- No scaling limitations mentioned
